title: AutoPhrasingTokenFilter compatibility with latest version of solr
description:
It seems AutoPhrasingTokenFilter is having compatibility issue with latest versions of solr (5.x and 4.10.x). It throws LUCENE_46 error while trying to use this filter, but it works properly in solr-4.7.0.
I've taken the latest code from GITHUB (URL - https://github.com/LucidWorks/auto-phrase-tokenfilter) and create a jar out of it.
Can you please give a remeadition appproach for the same?

comments.author: Shawn Heisey
comments.content: The auto-phrase-tokenfilter project is maintained by LucidWorks, not Apache.    This is the Apache issue tracker.  We will be closing this issue as invalid unless there is a problem in Solr that needs addressing.

comments.author: Shawn Heisey
comments.content: The project mentioned is not managed by Apache.  If the user problem turns out to be a bug in Solr, we can re-open this issue.
